'Davao City' (, ) is a city in Mindanao, Philippines which is the center of
Metro Davao, the second most populous and the third most significant
metropolitan area in the country. The city serves as the trade, commerce, and
industry hub in Mindanao and the regional center for Davao Region. Davao City is
the largest city in the Philippines in land area. As of 2011 it had an estimated
population of 1,530,365, making it the fourth-most-populous city in the
Philippines. Davao is home to Mount Apo, the highest mountain in the country.
categories: Populated coastal places in the Philippines
